description: Used to create items that are orientated around bashing.
Used to create items that are orientated around bacon.
Used to create items that are orientated around cutting.
A scale droppped from the LVL: 20 Plutonium Dragon! How the heck did you go this? You cheated, didn't you?

This is no ordinary bacon, this is SHADOW bacon! A rare delicacy, almost unheard of. It looks so amazing you feel unworthy being in it's presence, much less eating it. So instead, you can honor this fabled bacon by turning into freaking awesome gear! Either that or just sit it to collect dust on a shelf in you bunker. That would work too.
The ULTIMATE essence! Used to create by far the most powerful gear! You are either a god or cheated by obtaining this legendary item!
